        public IUser getUserDetails(java.lang.String sUserId)
        Description copied from interface: IUserManager
        Method which creates a user object for the given userId.
        Specified by:
        getUserDetails in interface IUserManager
        Parameters:
        : - userId - the userid for which the details are obtained.
        Returns:
        : IUser - User object with full details of user if he is present in the Quadriga DB. - User object assigned to 'No Account' role' if he is not present in Quadriga DB.

      • deleteUser

        public int deleteUser(java.lang.String sUserId)
        Description copied from interface: IUserManager
        Method to deactivate the user account in Quadriga database.
        Specified by:
        deleteUser in interface IUserManager
        Parameters:
        sUserId - The unique userid of the user
        Returns:
        Integer to indicate the operation status. 0 - Success. 1 - Already Inactive user. -1 - Error in performing the operation

      • addNewUser

        public int addNewUser(User newUser)
        Description copied from interface: IUserManager
        Method to add a new active user to the existing active user list in Quadriga database.
        Specified by:
        addNewUser in interface IUserManager
        Parameters:
        newUser - The user object which contains the details of the user to be added to Quadriga database.
        Returns:
        Integer to indicate the operation status. 0 - Success. 1 - Userid is taken. -1 - Error in performing the operation
